import sys
n=int(raw_input())
plus_minus={}
for i in range(n):
	
	tl=int(raw_input())
	
	for j in range(tl):
		n,k = sys.stdin.readline().split(' ')
		if not n in plus_minus:
			plus_minus[n]=0
			
		k=k.strip('\n')
		if plus_minus[n]==0 and k=='-':
			plus_minus[n] = -1
		elif plus_minus[n]==0 and k=='+':
			plus_minus[n] = 1
		elif plus_minus[n]==-1 and k=='-':
			plus_minus[n]=-1
		elif plus_minus[n]==1 and k=='+':
			plus_minus[n] =1
		elif plus_minus[n]==1 and k=='-':
			plus_minus[n] =-1
		elif plus_minus[n]==-1 and k=='+':
			plus_minus[n] =1
			
		count = 0
	for i in plus_minus:
		
		count=count+plus_minus[i]
		
	plus_minus.clear()
	print count
